text: Let me know if<https://github.com/HubSpot/uie-beta-public-app-samples/tree/main/multi-step-flow| this is helpful>

I am so happy I finally figured out how to set 1-many relationships with my custom objects I have been heavily involved learning about and working with the APIs for some UI-Extensions I am building. I did not think it was possible and finding that it indeed is was so rewarding!!
Okay thank you for your response <@U05KNCMAE7N>, I will check and let you know!
